Articles.Content: can someone make a dragon v2 capsule that works with 1.0.5? The only one ive seen was LAZTeks and that was only updated to work with .90

There is Tundra Exploration http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/74988-wip104-tundra-exploration-v07-stockalike-dragon-v2-and-falcon-9/ 

And there is Phoenix Industries Cargo Resupply Systemhttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110309-phoenix-industries-cargo-resupply-system-kismechjeb-compatible-v151/

There some nice stock like dragons

i saw those but they are both for 1.0.4, I thought there was something that changed with the polygons in the models or something with 1.0.5 that made old mods not work well anymore, which could explain why my 200 part station now takes forever to load, and makes the game lag

 

EDIT: I added the tundra exploration, and it looks good, my only issues are no built in parachutes (tho I dont remember if the actual one has one or not, and if it doesnt its not a big deal) no retractable landing gear/heat shield built in, and it doesnt look like it has actual engines in it like the real one, just the RCS engines.

I know I'm being a bit picky

Edited December 5, 2015 by crash087
Tundra exploration has 2 pods one does have the engines on it and one is the cargo pod that one doesn't

13 hours ago, crash087 said:

i saw those but they are both for 1.0.4, I thought there was something that changed with the polygons in the models or something with 1.0.5 that made old mods not work well anymore, which could explain why my 200 part station now takes forever to load, and makes the game lag

 

EDIT: I added the tundra exploration, and it looks good, my only issues are no built in parachutes (tho I dont remember if the actual one has one or not, and if it doesnt its not a big deal) no retractable landing gear/heat shield built in, and it doesnt look like it has actual engines in it like the real one, just the RCS engines.

I know I'm being a bit picky

It is indeed for 1.0.4 since I haven't had the time to fix the colliders yet. 

No built in parachutes, IIRC the actual V2 has emergency chutes but you can easily just use the stock radial ones. In the advanced heatshield there are indeed retractable landing gear built in. Just right click it. The Rodan(V2) has actual engines along with RCS.
Ah, I completely misread the description, and missed the advanced heatshield entirely, my mistake. Thank you sir!

There are some older ones like KerbX - A SpaceX analogue mod  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/29044-020x-kerbx-a-spacex-analogue-mod/&page=1

And CardBoardBoxPro http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/19082-cbbp-dragon-rider-podcapsule/
